14
15#ifndef DNS_CLIENTINFO_H
16#define DNS_CLIENTINFO_H 1
17
18/*****
19 ***** Module Info
20 *****/
21
22/*! \file dns/clientinfo.h
23 * \brief
24 * The DNS clientinfo interface allows libdns to retrieve information
25 * about the client from the caller.
26 *
27 * The clientinfo interface is used by the DNS DB and DLZ interfaces;
28 * it allows databases to modify their answers on the basis of information
29 * about the client, such as source IP address.
30 *
31 * dns_clientinfo_t contains a pointer to an opaque structure containing
32 * client information in some form. dns_clientinfomethods_t contains a
33 * list of methods which operate on that opaque structure to return
34 * potentially useful data. Both structures also contain versioning
35 * information.
36 */
37
38/*****
39 ***** Imports
40 *****/
41
42#include <inttypes.h>
43
44#include <isc/sockaddr.h>
45#include <isc/types.h>
46
47ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
48
49/*****
50 ***** Types
51 *****/
52
53#define DNS_CLIENTINFO_VERSION 2
54typedef struct dns_clientinfo {
55 uint16_t version;
56 void *data;
57 void *dbversion;
58} dns_clientinfo_t;
59
60typedef isc_result_t (*dns_clientinfo_sourceip_t)(dns_clientinfo_t *client,
61 isc_sockaddr_t **addrp);
62
63#define DNS_CLIENTINFOMETHODS_VERSION 1
64#define DNS_CLIENTINFOMETHODS_AGE 0
65
66typedef struct dns_clientinfomethods {
67 uint16_t version;
68 uint16_t age;
69 dns_clientinfo_sourceip_t sourceip;
70} dns_clientinfomethods_t;
71
72/*****
73 ***** Methods
74 *****/
75void
76dns_clientinfomethods_init(dns_clientinfomethods_t *methods,
77 dns_clientinfo_sourceip_t sourceip);
78
79void
80dns_clientinfo_init(dns_clientinfo_t *ci, void *data, void *versionp);
81
82ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
83
84#endif /* DNS_CLIENTINFO_H */
85
